title: Why Did the Chicken?
description: Morgan is a man who has been hurt deeply, and because of this he has hidden away his heart. However, his heart as well as other portions of his anatomy wake up and take notice when his new neighbor Rich moves in next door. While Morgan may lust from afar, he does not think that Rich could possibly be attracted to him.A county sheriff, Rich is more than interested in Morgan his next door neighbor, but he has a young son to think of as well. Not all potential mates have been interested in Rich because he has a child.
author: Kate Steele
